department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: carved small female figure; kneeling with the feet tucked beneath the body on a small rectangular base; heavily scarified shoulders and back; arms held at sides and hands tucked into fetish binding around torso; finely incised features; fine dark, glossy patina
medium: hard wood, finely woven cotton fibre, split cane, twisted vegetable fibre
title: Kneeling Female Figure
